attributes.action: Review the minimum size of Parking Spaces
attributes.additional_details: This is causing real issues in damage and access plus housing developments have unrealistic provisions for owner parking. A realistic approach needs to be taken especially in new housing developments and retail parks, along with payment spaces.
attributes.background: Parking spaces were last reviewed in the 1970s but since then the size of vehicles have increased. Please review the size to reflect the true average size of vehicles.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action:

Set minimum parking space width in car parks as 3.6 metres
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730749
